thread.title: Big 12 restarting postseason softball tournament in Oklahoma
thread.title_full: Big 12 restarting postseason softball tournament in Oklahoma

title: Big 12 restarting postseason softball tournament in Oklahoma
text:
Big 12 postseason softball tournament to restart in 2017 in Oklahoma City THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   4:58   4:58   
Subjects: 

OKLAHOMA CITY — The Big 12 will restart the postseason softball tournament beginning in 2017. 
The conference announced Thursday that the tournament will be played May 12 and May 13 at the ASA Hall of Fame Stadium complex in Oklahoma City. 
The top six teams will take part in pool play during the tournament. Seven conference members sponsor softball. 
The postseason conference softball tournament was last held in 2010.
